long_description: Built for women, our 27-speed Novara Carema has a sport geometry, Shimano Sora drivetrain and a vibration-damping carbon fork that make it ideal for a century as well as club rides and fitness. Aluminum frame features shaped seatstays and top tube for enhanced comfort and performance; tapered head tube improves strength and handling precision. Carema geometry is optimized to offer a comfortable, women-specific fit. Fork boasts a tapered alloy steerer with a 1-piece alloy crown for strength and stiffness where it counts; carbon legs help damp road vibrations and reduce weight. Updated Shimano Sora shifters and derailleurs offer responsive shifts throughout the 27 gears, even when in the drops, enabling you to spin the right gear for the grade. Tektro long-reach caliper brakes offer fender clearance and deliver dependable braking power. Eyelets for fenders or a rack let you outfit the Carema for wet-weather or commuting performance (fenders or rack sold separately). Replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend the usable life of the frame. Specs on our Novara Carema women's road bike are subject to change.
